alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued September 25 at 8:52PM EDT until September 28 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT NOW THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Lake and Ashtabula Counties in northeast Ohio and Erie County in northwest Pennsylvania. * WHEN...Through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Periods of heavy lake effect rain will occur tonight through late Tuesday night. Rainfall totals of 2 to 4 inches are expected. Higher totals are possible where rain bands persist the longest. The heaviest rainfall is expected to be focused along and near the Lake Erie shore.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
